code: import React from"react";import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var CartSlices=createSlice({name:"cart",initialState:[],reducers:{add:function add(state,action){state.push(action.payload);},remove:function remove(state,action){return state.filter(function(item){return item.id!==action.payload;});}}});var _CartSlices$actions=CartSlices.actions,add=_CartSlices$actions.add,remove=_CartSlices$actions.remove;export{add,remove};export default CartSlices.reducer;
